title: Landlord Ladies:: Desperate Women in Difficult Times
description: Times are hard and these women can't pay the rent! But they do have assets - if they are willing to use them. Read about three such women who agree to unusual and degrading ways to save their homes. One becomes a stripper, another a bondage and fetish model and the third enters into a straightforward deal with her sex for a rent discount. All get a lot more than they bargained for.
author: J.W. McKenna
